attributes.action: Reduce the motorway speed limit to 60mph thus reducing carbon emissions and improving road safety and casualty figures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By reducing the motorway speed limit to 60mph, we can dramatically impact both the carbon emissions level and reduce injury and death caused by excessive speed.

Many individuals will believe that this is a restriction of human rights, but it is only by imposing measures such as these that positive impact can be made in two important areas.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
